page.title: 11Hobbies
page.content: We asked people about their hobbies.The most popular one was gardening,but there were many others mentioned.These were: weaving, spinning, sailing, rugby, cycling, sewing,reading,knitting,swimming and walking. Some people said they did not have time for any hobbies.Nobody put down watching television as a hobby but most people said they had a television set so we assume they sometimes watch it.Some people also have video machines.We think the hobbies are about the same here as anywhere else in the country. One sport is fairly unique in the West country and that is skittles. Most public houses have a skittle alley where the game is played with wooden balls and nine pins. League matches are played between rival teams.
